column4: is sata generally hotswappable?  I bought an enclosure that supports eSATA and it came with a bracket that just connects an eSATA connector on the back of the bracket/case to a SATA connector on the motherboard... I'm wondering whether that's safe to hotplug
at least as far as I know, there is no Linux support for hotswapping eSATA yet.
k.. that's a shame... but thanks
